meanings.definition: A unit of weight for precious stones and pearls, equivalent to 200 milligrams.
meanings.sent1: She found a beautiful diamond ring that was measured in carats.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler mentioned that the necklace contained a 5-carat diamond.
meanings.sent3: The pirate captain boasted about his treasure chest full of carats, but they turned out to be just shiny rocks.
meanings.sent4: Her smile sparkled like a carat in the sunlight, radiating joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The carat of the gemstone glinted in the candlelight, captivating all who beheld it.
